definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: It has started membership negotiations with Croatia and, most momentously, with Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 此外，歐盟業已起動與克羅地亞的入盟談判，以及。

sentences.english: The accession criteria are inconsistent with basic stability rules.
sentences.chinese: 入盟標準與根本穩定原則不符。

contract of alliance/oath or treaty between allies

to lobby/to campaign/to promote (an idea, a product)/(old) to visit various rulers and promote one's political ideas (in the Warring States period)
to be a candidate in an election or other selection process/to run for office/to turn out to vote
